fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Teeter Dance** Redirect a player into someone else. If they have an attack value, raise It by one. May not target members of the Pokemon Faction
**Calm Mind**The next night, up your Attack and Defense value by 1.
**Baton Pass** (Day Ability) Transfer the Attack and Defense Value that you will have at the end of the next night to a random player.
**Evolve** Evolve into Mr Mime. May only evolve if you have indirectly killed 3 players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Calm Mind** can stack as long as It Is used multiple nights in a row.
